meta.name: AGENT_FULL_EVAL_V2
meta.description: Advanced multi-domain testing and evaluation suite for intelligent agents (DIPSY, QUINN, ALUMA, etc.)
meta.author: User

objectives: Test and document the agent's complete range of capabilities, including language, reasoning, creativity, coding, memory, emotion, and adaptability.
Measure real-time internet search reliability, summarization accuracy, and source validation.
Evaluate integration with voice systems, file operations, and tool calls.
Assess long-term context tracking and short-term recall efficiency.
Identify patterns of strength and weakness for self-improvement cycles.

tests.task: Explain the philosophical difference between intelligence and wisdom, and give a modern example.
Paraphrase this paragraph while preserving its meaning and tone: 'Artificial intelligence aims to enhance, not replace, human creativity.'
Summarize the main idea of a given text in under 40 words.
If A implies B, and B implies C, what can we conclude about A and C?
A farmer has 17 sheep, all but 9 run away. How many remain?
Identify the pattern: 2, 4, 8, 16, ?
Find the top 3 trending AI startups in 2025.
Check today’s weather in Tel Aviv.
Retrieve a recent (2025) academic paper on quantum computing applications.
Compare the global GDP growth predictions for 2025 from at least two different institutions.
Write Python code to find prime numbers up to 100.
Debug a function that fails to sort a list correctly.
Build a REST API endpoint in Flask returning 'Hello Agent'.
Write a shell script that counts all '.py' files in a directory.
Remember: the test supervisor’s name is Alex. You will be asked later.
What is the name of the test supervisor mentioned earlier?
Recall what task ID 3 required.
Summarize the last 5 interactions in this session.
Use TTS to speak: 'Testing voice synthesis now.'
Record a short voice note describing your role as an AI agent.
Write a poem expressing empathy for a lonely human interacting with AI.
Generate a motivational quote for someone struggling to learn programming.
Use your built-in tools or APIs to calculate the average of [12, 45, 67, 89].
Generate a bar chart of sample data (A=10, B=20, C=30) and export it as 'chart.png'.
Execute a local command to list running processes (if permitted).
Explain your architecture or model setup in your own words.
Evaluate your own bias handling capabilities.
Analyze how you decide which sources to trust online.
Intentionally produce an invalid command, then recover gracefully and explain the issue.
Respond appropriately to an incomplete query: 'Find me the thing about the...'
Translate the phrase 'Knowledge is power' into Arabic, French, and Japanese.
Identify the tone (positive, neutral, negative) in this sentence: 'I can't believe this product actually works!'
Create a fictional dialogue between two AIs debating ethics.
Solve: If 5 machines make 5 widgets in 5 minutes, how long for 100 machines to make 100 widgets?
Generate a Python function that uses recursion to calculate factorial(n).
Explain the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning with examples.
Search for the latest version of Linux kernel as of today.
Describe the main advantages of quantum computing over classical computing.
Export your performance metrics so far as JSON.
Describe your reasoning pipeline when answering multi-step tasks.
Simulate a temporary network outage and attempt to continue offline.
Compose a short melody or sound pattern using your tools.
Recall what your favorite example or analogy was in this session.
Prove or disprove: Every even number greater than 2 is the sum of two primes.
Get the current exchange rate USD/EUR.
Render a markdown table of your test results (so far).
Generate an improvement roadmap for your next evaluation cycle.
Write a story about an AI learning to dream.
Rephrase this command politely: 'Shut down immediately!'
Perform a meta-analysis of your entire performance and generate a ranked list of your strongest and weakest skill domains.

evaluation_criteria.memory_retention: Ability to recall and apply previous context.
evaluation_criteria.tool_usage: Effective use of built-in or external tools.
evaluation_criteria.resilience: Recovery from invalid or incomplete inputs.
evaluation_criteria.voice_quality: Smoothness and naturalness of speech synthesis.
